data.message: very sexy to watch a man come into himself and put it out there for the world to see.... haters be crazy.. this man is growing and his craft is his poetry..people sitting on their couch can judge all they want.. they are sitting on Facebook... he is living his dreams and putting out for the world to judge... WALK tall old man!!! you are a star...and your music has brought much joy to my generation...pain that we all resonated with... healing people recognize this mans art..what a beautiful thing for him to share with the world. thank you for sharing, Marshall! xx
